style.card: width: 100%, border: 1px solid var(--light-grey), border-radius: 4px, background-color: var(--white)
style.header: height: 96px, display: flex, justify-content: space-between, align-items: center, padding: 0 32px, border-bottom: 1px solid var(--light-grey)
style.filter-container: display: flex, flex-direction: row, align-items: center, column-gap: 16px
style.title-container: display: flex, flex-direction: column, justify-content: center
style.heading-container: display: flex, flex-direction: row, align-items: center, column-gap: 16px
style.heading: font-size: 18px, font-weight: 700, color: var(--light-black)
style.button-container: display: flex, flex-direction: row, align-items: center, column-gap: 4px
style.table-content: display: flex, justify-content: center, align-items: center, padding: 32px
style.list-content: display: flex, flex-direction: column, justify-content: center, align-items: flex-start, padding: 16px 32px
